Package emissary.util.xml

Class JDOMUtil

java.lang.Object
emissary.util.xml.AbstractJDOMUtil
emissary.util.xml.JDOMUtil
public class JDOMUtil extends AbstractJDOMUtil
Utilities for dealing with JDOM documents. If DTD validation is not needed, consider using SaferJDOMUtil.

      public static org.jdom2.Document createDocument(String xml, boolean validate) throws org.jdom2.JDOMException
      creates a JDOM document from the input XML string.
      Parameters:
      xml - an XML document in a String
      validate - if true, XML should be validated
      Returns:
      the JDOM representation of that XML document
      Throws:
      org.jdom2.JDOMException

    • createDocument

      public static org.jdom2.Document createDocument(byte[] xml, XMLFilter filter, boolean validate) throws org.jdom2.JDOMException
      creates a JDOM document from the input XML bytes. interpreting them in the platform default charset
      Parameters:
      xml - an XML document in a byte array
      filter - an XMLFilter to receive callbacks during processing
      validate - if true, XML should be validated
      Returns:
      the JDOM representation of that XML document

      org.jdom2.JDOMException

      Parameters:

      filter - an XMLFilter to receive callbacks during processing
